## Summary
- Title: `Fixes #<issue-number>: <short title>`
- Please provide a brief summary of the changes.

## Motivation and Context
- Why is this change required?
- What problem does it solve?

## How Has This Been Tested?
- Environment (OS, browser/Node version)
- Steps taken to verify

## Screenshots (optional)
- If UI changes, add screenshots/GIFs.

## Type of Changes
- [ ] feat (new feature)
- [ ] fix (bug fix)
- [ ] docs (documentation)
- [ ] refactor (refactoring without behavior change)
- [ ] perf (performance improvement)
- [ ] test (adding or updating tests)
- [ ] build/ci (build or CI related)
- [ ] chore (maintenance)
- [ ] revert (reverting changes)

## Checklist
- [ ] Linked issue referenced (e.g., Fixes #123)
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Linting completed
- [ ] Build passes
- [ ] Tests added/updated and pass
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] No breaking changes introduced / noted
